output_list.reason: The transfer function does not check if the sender has enough tokens to cover the requested transfer amount, which can lead to a reentrancy attack.
The transferFrom function does not check if the sender has enough allowance to cover the requested transfer amount, which can lead to a reentrancy attack.
The batchTransfer function does not check if the sender has enough tokens to cover the requested transfer amount for all receivers, which can lead to a reentrancy attack.
